content: KDnuggets in collaboration with Corinium Global Intelligence would like to offer you an exclusive 30% discount to join us in San Francisco on April 26 th for Chief Data Officer, Financial Services , West ( bit.ly/2oy4PFv ). If you missed out the very successful  CDO Financial Services East in New York this week. Do not despair, CDO Financial Services West is just a few weeks away. Here are few of the testimonials from the sold out Chief Data Officer, Financial Services on the East Coast last week. "The CDO Conference was a valuable discussion on current trends and challenges with implementing data-driven solutions." Chris Allen, Specialist , CIBC "I thought this was a very insightful conference. Good level of content, great location, convenient and liked that it was one day." - Joan Dal Bianco, SVP, Head U.S. Office of the Chief Data Officer ,  TD Bank Now in their second year, the event is seen as the premier event for the sector’s high-level data practitioners to meet and discuss the biggest strategic issues of the day. Each event will bring together over 100 senior data leaders in the industry to share the latest innovations, best practises, challenges and uses cases, as well as facilitate conversations and connections in the Financial services. To give you a taste, topics covered will include delivering value for your business through data and analytics, leading organizational change to become truly data-centric, and successfully utilizing the latest technological innovations. Confirmed speakers include CDOs, CAO, and other senior data executives from Charles Schwab, HomeUnion, Nationstar Mortgage, First Tech Federal Credit Union, Wells Fargo, Caliber Home Loans, Bank of the West, Silicon Valley Bank, Bank of America, Protivitita, Options Clearing Corporation, EZCORP, Elevate, Bank of America, VISA, Franklin Templeton Investments, BECU, First Republic Bank, Putnam Investments, TD Ameritrade, Rabobank, Redis Labs Inc . View all speakers here . Make sure to check out the full speaker line-up and agenda – both of which are easily available on the websites. Be sure to take advantage of this exclusive discount and save over $500 - simply register and apply the discount code: KD30 . Further discounts are available when you are registering groups of three or more at the same time or if you would like to attend both the events. Email me at inquiries@coriniumintelligence.com for further information. I hope to see you in San Francisco this April – do feel free to contact me for more information Best Regards, Moniza Sabbar  Event Marketing Manager  Corinium Global Intelligence E - inquiries@coriniumintelligence.com

Chief Data Officer, Financial Services, San Francisco, April 26 – KDnuggets Offer

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: CA, Chief Data Officer, Corinium, Finance, San Francisco

Chief Data Officer, Financial Services, West is coming to San Francisco on April 26th. Corinium Global Intelligence and KDnuggets would like to offer you an exclusive 30% discount to join us. Save over $500 using discount code KD30 during registration.


KDnuggets in collaboration with Corinium Global Intelligence would like to offer you an exclusive 30% discount to join us in San Francisco on April 26th for Chief Data Officer, Financial Services, West (bit.ly/2oy4PFv).

If you missed out the very successful CDO Financial Services East in New York this week. Do not despair, CDO Financial Services West is just a few weeks away. Here are few of the testimonials from the sold out Chief Data Officer, Financial Services on the East Coast last week.

  • "The CDO Conference was a valuable discussion on current trends and challenges with implementing data-driven solutions." Chris Allen, Specialist, CIBC
  • "I thought this was a very insightful conference. Good level of content, great location, convenient and liked that it was one day." - Joan Dal Bianco, SVP, Head U.S. Office of the Chief Data Officer, TD Bank

Now in their second year, the event is seen as the premier event for the sector’s high-level data practitioners to meet and discuss the biggest strategic issues of the day. Each event will bring together over 100 senior data leaders in the industry to share the latest innovations, best practises, challenges and uses cases, as well as facilitate conversations and connections in the Financial services. To give you a taste, topics covered will include delivering value for your business through data and analytics, leading organizational change to become truly data-centric, and successfully utilizing the latest technological innovations.

Confirmed speakers include CDOs, CAO, and other senior data executives from Charles Schwab, HomeUnion, Nationstar Mortgage, First Tech Federal Credit Union, Wells Fargo, Caliber Home Loans, Bank of the West, Silicon Valley Bank, Bank of America, Protivitita, Options Clearing Corporation, EZCORP, Elevate, Bank of America, VISA, Franklin Templeton Investments, BECU, First Republic Bank, Putnam Investments, TD Ameritrade, Rabobank, Redis Labs Inc. View all speakers here.

Make sure to check out the full speaker line-up and agenda – both of which are easily available on the websites.

Be sure to take advantage of this exclusive discount and save over $500 - simply register and apply the discount code: KD30. Further discounts are available when you are registering groups of three or more at the same time or if you would like to attend both the events. Email me at inquiries@coriniumintelligence.com for further information.

I hope to see you in San Francisco this April – do feel free to contact me for more information

Best Regards,
Moniza Sabbar 
Event Marketing Manager 
Corinium Global Intelligence

E - inquiries@coriniumintelligence.com
